reviews.review_text: Explore the ultimate destination for budget-friendly dining conveniently situated by the roadside. Easy accessibility makes it a go-to spot, allowing you to bring your car and order delectable food while enjoying refreshing drinks. With affordability at its core, this eatery not only offers pocket-friendly options but also maintains a commendable standard of quality. Make sure to include this culinary hotspot in your itinerary when you find yourself near or on Candolim Beach, ensuring a delightful experience that won't break the bank.

One of the tastiest and budget friendly restaurant in candolim Goa. After trying many expensive restaurants in and around Goa this is by far the best. The food is super yummy. They have amazing fish fries which is undoubtedly fresh and prepared wither with their special masala or rawa fry. Our favourite was king fish.(updated Menu is attached). This place is opened from 11:00 am to 02:00 am at night. Takeaway option is also good as they pack the food really well. Their Chinese options are exceptionally tasty. Indian vegetarian and non vegetarian options are endless. We tried their dal which just felt like home. Chicken tikka masala was better than many other places in Goa. Very accommodating staff and owner. Do give it a try for a budget friendly,hygenic and tummy full meals. See you thereüòáüôèüèª

This simple restaurant located in Candolim is well-known for its fish delicacies.
So ordered Kingfish Masala, rice and dal. Had a satisfying meal as the fish turned out to be well cooked with the right amount of spices thereby making it delicious.
The USP of this restaurant is tasty food at affordable rates.
